name: Themes Coder – Create Android & iOS Apps For Your Woocommerce Site
author: ThemesCoder

sections.description:
TC Ecommerce Plugin is complete mobile app solution for android and iOS platform with WordPress WooCommerce as backend. You have variety of ready made eCommerce pages to create your mobile app. It’s best app for any type of store like Fashion, Electronics, Grocery and Restaurant. Whether you are store owner or developer, it’s best solution for faster development with low cost. this plugin allow you to select any layout from list you like most. there are a number of layout available for “App Home Layout” , “Category Layout” , “Card Layout” and General settings.

Demo Testing

You can test Plugin demo using this trial code after installation
287531824430751112562695265272523654

Popular WordPress Plugin Supported

  • Multi Language Plugin (WPML)
  • Multi Currency Plugin (WOOCS)
  • Multi Vendor Plugins
    >> Dokan Multi Vendor Plugin
    >> WC Vendors Marketplace
    >> Product Vendors
    >> WCFM – WooCommerce Multivendor Marketplace
  • WooCommerce Points & Rewards Plugin
  • After Shipping Delivery and Tracking Plugin
  • Scratch card Plugin
  • Deep Link Plugin

Application Features

  • Multiple Home Page Styles
  • Multiple Category Page Styles
  • Multiple Shipping Methods
  • Multiple Payment Methods
  • Featured Products Implemented
  • Attribute Based Inventory
  • Special Sales Implemented
  • One Push Notification Integrated
  • Facebook Login
  • Stock Management
  • App side Bar
  • Cash Management

Installation & Customization

We provide professional web and app development services along with app submission on apple and android stores. We handle the configuration and building process of your app. Don’t worry about all the technical requirements. Just contact us and get everything done. We will go through the whole submission process for you. You’ll only have to provide your requirements, we will take care of the rest.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to “TC Ecommerce” ==> Activate plugin using purchase code
  4. As soon as plugin active will redirect to options page.
sections.faq:
What kind of businesses could be managed through this app?

This app is designed in such a manner that any business irrespective of its size and nature could be run through this. Still, it is ideally perfect for businesses like retail, electronics, restaurant, etc.

Can i change Icon and Splash Screen ?

Yes , for this purpose a well managed documentation link will provide you.

Can i change Introduction slides of application ?

Yes , you can

Can i set Home page and Category Page layout?

Yes , you can change it easily from plugin

Can i set my app to multi language?

Yes , you can change it easily from plugin
